It's not that difficult to figure out the basics of setting it up (where to put battery, SD card, etc.) from the pictures, but it's the subtle details of using it that I won't get with the instructions only in Spanish.  Perhaps Panasonic wants me to take up Spanish????  I may write a follow-up based on actual usage, but when the packaging is incorrect from the get go, it kind of leaves a bad taste in your mouth.

Reviews.Title: wrong color
Reviews.Author: Bernard Riley "halfpint"
Reviews.Content: I ordered the red one and you shipped the black one,a bit disappointed,it was a christmas gift so the person cant get what they wanted.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: clio
Reviews.Content: como no estoy en Estados Unidos, aun no he recibido mi paquete en mi pais de origen. Estoy esperando a ver que tal la camara.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: jeremy
Reviews.Content: good wide angle camera battery lasts long time. very good camera. german lenzzzz  seven more words required for this review

Reviews.Title: Like the camera - "Accessory" no good
Reviews.Author: A. Lamas
Reviews.Content: Really, the camera is fine and I like it well enough.  However, the "accessory" which one plugs into the wall to charge the battery, conked out after 5 months.  (3 month old warranty.)  I'm sure there are other fine cameras out there, however, I will not purchase another Panasonic because of this.  P.S.  Keep pressing "0" if you call customer service.  You will ultimately get a human being.  You will have to ask them to speak up, but eventually communication will ensue and they will have no idea how much the inconvenience of a broken "accessory" costs and will talk very much about the expired warranty.

Reviews.Title: Only worked for four months
Reviews.Author: Gary Nowlin "revbgary"
Reviews.Content: The USB port on the camera broke and now it is a useless piece of junk after only four months.  We bought this camera from As Good As New Electronics from Amazon.  This was a scam.  This was a used camera that broke after only four months.  The price of this camera new was around $130.00 and we paid about $100.00.  This was a used camera, not a refurbished camera.  This piece of junk should not have sold at almost the cost of a new camera.  As Good As New Electronics and Panasonic have been contacted and they refuse to service the camera.  DO NOT BUY.

Reviews.Title: Audible and videos are off and ruined all my memories
Reviews.Author: CARLA HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: I think the photos are ok, but not good for videos - you see lips move and seconds later hear the words

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Huy Nguyen
Reviews.Content: i think i like the canon n sony better cuz its easier to use.  i hardly use it cuz it takes a lot of time to switch between mode

Reviews.Title: Inadequate information
Reviews.Author: Marc A. Kaplan
Reviews.Content: I just received delivery of the camera today, and I can't write a full review yet.  I won't even be able to find out if the thing works until I wait 180 minutes for the battery to charge.  What I can do is complain bitterly about yet another technology product that is delivered with only the most basic of instructions in writing.  The actual manual comes on a CD.  To really learn how to use the camera, one must either read the 128 page manual on a computer screen or print it at one's own expense.  Only after doing so, does one learn that one really should have purchased a memory card at the same time and that the camera is just too complicated for a point-and-shoot guy.  Sorry -- this is my first digital camera, and I'm not a mind reader or willing to spend the next week figuring out how it works.  And I find no evidence anywhere that there's a warranty of any kind.  I bought a camera now because I lost my old one that used film (remember film?), I needed something to take pictures on an up-coming vacation, and Consumer Reports check rated it last year.  I am not a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC FH-8 Digital Damera
Reviews.Author: puzzlefan42
Reviews.Content: I received the Panasonic Lumix camera as a Christmas present.  The instruction booklet that came with it was in Spanish on one side and Portugese on the other...nothing in English.  I had to go on the internet and download 125 pages to get the instructions for using the camera. I have had difficulty downloading pictures to my PC and the zoom doesn't take clear pictures.  On the whole, I am very disappointed with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Trying 5 stars as Amazon is censoring 1
Reviews.Author: Paul Ludlow
Reviews.Content: I have just been e-mailed that the camera part of the order cannot be fulfilled 4 days after placing when when the delivery was 2 days Prime. The email was a 'cancelled, tough luck' email. My daughter is leaving for Florida without a camera, Great service! Please refund my annual Prime subscription in full as you messed up the first order I placed so I have no confidence in ever getting what I ordered in 2 days. No need for Prime as this is my last order. You add insult to injury, I followed one of the links in the email and I can now have it for $30 more!Murari:Hello, I'm Murari from Amazon.I am sorry that you didn't receive the package yet.Case Logic TBC-302 FFP Compact Camera Case (Black)Me:Sorry Murai, not interested in the case, you have cancelled the camera.Murari:I checked your order and see that the order was shipped on February 26 and is out for delivery. Please wait a little longer to receive the package. I can confirm that you will receive the package by the end of March 1.Me:You do not get it do you? I ordered a camera and the order has been wiped by you.Please read my first comments and understand they were not about a case for $6.99. I ordered a camera as well.Murari:I am sorry for the misunderstanding.Since the item is not available, we are unable to ship the item Panasonic Lumix DMC FH-8 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and we have canceled the order. I am really sorry for that.Me:So please refund my Prime subscription as you cannot be trusted to deliver something in 2 days that was accepted as an order 4 days ago. You have spoiled the beginning of a holiday.Murari:Paul, if you prefer, please place the new order for the item Panasonic Lumix DMC FH-8 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom for $179.99 and place the order with One Day Delivery, I will waive the shipping charges now. Since the item is sold by the seller, I don't have an option to adjust the price, however, I will personally follow up with this and issue $30 refund once the order is shipped. Is that OK with you?Me:My daughter leaves for Florida in hours, not a day. Can you please refund my Prime subscription. Amazon has let us down.Murari:

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: ELIEZER
Reviews.Content: The camera was mailed with a manual in Spanish and Portugese, and I am still trying to get a manual in English.

Reviews.Title: Needs memory card
Reviews.Author: Allen C Dunstan
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine, but they don't tell you that the camera can only take about 10 pictures. You have to buy a memory card if you want more pictures. I was very disappointed when on vacation, I could only take about 9 pictures. It was of little use. I have ordered a memory card, but I would have ordered it with the camera had I known.

Reviews.Title: Never got it and nobody really cares.
Reviews.Author: Ed Hale
Reviews.Content: Order never received.  Lasership provided conflicting delivery dates.  Ordered 3 items but received none, and while customer service was polite, it was a bit demeaning.  Was told Amazon only stocked the camera case, not the camera or battery.  Amazon then offered to re-ship the case, but could do nothing about the rest.  Why not just offer a full refund - I had to ask for it.  Used a gift card and was told amount would be credited back, but have not been able to confirm that yet.  Very reluctant to do any more business with Amazon and would immediately cancel any order if Lasership was used.  Currently have $200 in gift cards and am considering re-gifting them, and any others I might receive in the future, but not to a close friend.  Camera was ordered to be used at a special occasion, had to scramble to find a replacement quickly.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son's wedding, but the camera is not as easy to use as my old one, price is good but the photos did not match my cheaper camera!

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: creekriot
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this purchase, but pretty low quality item.  Ten words are a minimum requirement to submit this form and I have nothing more to say.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful 5x z OIS zoom
3" LCD
720p HD Video
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC FH-8 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Red)
